00037 /**
00038  * Implementation of hook_theme().
00039  */
00040 function slpjq_theme() {
00041   return array(
00042     'slpjq_slider' => array(
00043       'arguments' => array(
00044         'logged_in' => user_is_logged_in(),
00045         'title' => variable_get('slpjq_title', ''),
00046         'image_url' => variable_get('slpjq_image_url', ''),
00047         'user_register' => variable_get('user_register', 1),
00048         ),
00049       'template' => 'slpjq-slider',
00050       'path' => slpjq_get_path('theme'),
00051     ),
00052   );
00053 }
00054

00056 /**
00057  * Implementation of hook_help().
00058  */
00059 function slpjq_help($path, $arg) {
00060   if ($path == 'admin/help#slpjq') {
00061     $description = t('Sliding login panel using jQuery');
00062     return
00063       '<div class="slpjq-help"><p>' .
00064       t('Sliding login panel using jQuery') .
00065       '</p></div>';
00066   }
00067 }

00070 /**
00071  * Implementation of hook_menu().
00072  */
00073 function slpjq_menu() {
00074   return array('admin/settings/slpjq' => array(
00075     'title' => 'SlipJaq',
00076     'description' => 'SlipJaq configuration',
00077     'page callback' => 'drupal_get_form',
00078     'page arguments' => array('slpjq_admin'),
00079     'access arguments' => array('administer site configuration'),
00080     'type' => MENU_NORMAL_ITEM,
00081     ));
00082 }

00085 /**
00086  * Implementation of hook_block().
00087  */
00088 function slpjq_block($op = 'list', $delta = 0, $edit = array()) {
00089   if ($op == 'list') {
00090     return array(array(
00091         'info' => t('SlipJaq - Sliding login panel using jQuery'),
00092         'cache' => BLOCK_CACHE_PER_USER,
00093         'visibility' => 0, // This item is not displayed on the pages in the following list.
00094         'pages' => variable_get('slpjq_disallowed_paths', array()),
00095         ),
00096       );
00097   }
00098   elseif ($op == 'configure') {
00099     $form = slpjq_get_config_form();
00100     // Don't present the full-page option on the block configuration screen.
00101     unset($form['slpjq_display_top']);
00102     return $form;
00103   }
00104   elseif ($op == 'save') {
00105     $form = slpjq_get_config_form();
00106     // Turn off the top display if the block is edited.
00107     // (Yes, this might be confusing, but not as confusing if *both* are selected.)
00108     variable_set('slpjq_display_top', FALSE);
00109     unset($form['slpjq_display_top']);
00110     foreach ($form as $field => $v) {
00111       variable_set($field, $edit[$field]);
00112     }
00113   }
00114   elseif ($op == 'view') {
00115     return array(
00116       'content' => slpjq_slider_render(),
00117       );
00118   }
00119   else {
00120     return NULL;
00121   }
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 /**
00126  * Implementation of hook_init().
00127  *
00128  */
00129 function slpjq_init() {
00130   if (slpjq_slider_allowed_here()) {
00131     drupal_add_css(slpjq_get_path('css/slpjq.css'));
00132     // only add the JavaScript when the dynamic slider is active.
00133     if (!user_is_logged_in()) {
00134       drupal_add_js(array('slpjq' => array('slidePeriod' => variable_get('slpjq_slide_period', ''))), 'setting');
00135       drupal_add_js(slpjq_get_path('js/slpjq.js'));
00136     }
00137   }
00138 }

00141 /**
00142  * Implementation of hook_footer().
00143  *
00144  * This is where we insert the page-top version of the slider.
00145  */
00146 function slpjq_footer($is_front = FALSE) {
00147   if (variable_get('slpjq_display_top', FALSE) && slpjq_slider_allowed_here()) {
00148     return slpjq_slider_render();
00149   }
00150 }

00153 /**
00154  * Implementation of hook_form_user_login_block_alter().
00155  *
00156  * @see slpjq_form_user_login_block_validate()
00157  */
00158 function slpjq_form_user_login_block_alter(&$form, &$form_state) {
00159   $form['links'] = array();     // Remove the "create new account" & "send pw reminder" links.
00160   $form['#action'] = url('user', array('query' => drupal_get_destination()));
00161   $form['#validate'][] = 'slpjq_form_user_login_block_validate';
00162 }
00163

00165 /**
00166  * Implementation of hook_form_user_register_alter().
00167  *
00168  * @see slpjq_form_user_register_validate()
00169  */
00170 function slpjq_form_user_register_alter(&$form, &$form_state) {
00171   $form['submit']['#value'] = variable_get('slpjq_create_button_text', '');
00172   $form['#action'] = url('user/register', array('query' => drupal_get_destination()));
00173   $form['#validate'][] = 'slpjq_form_user_register_validate';
00174 }

00187 /**
00188  * Redirect to the login page if there were login form errors.
00189  *
00190  * @see slpjq_form_user_login_block_alter()
00191  */
00192 function slpjq_form_user_login_block_validate($form, &$form_state) {
00193   slpjq_redirect_form_if_errors($form, 'login');
00194 }

00200  * @see slpjq_form_user_register_alter()
00201  */
00202 function slpjq_form_user_register_validate($form, &$form_state) {
00203   slpjq_redirect_form_if_errors($form, 'user/register');
00204 }

00214 /**
00215  * Return the form for our settings page.
00216  */
00217 function slpjq_admin() {
00218   return system_settings_form(slpjq_get_config_form());
00219 }

00222 /**
00223  * Return TRUE if the given path begins with the specified prefix.
00224  */
00225 function _slpjq_path_begins_with($prefix, $path) {
00226   return (($path == $prefix) || (drupal_substr($path, 0, drupal_strlen($prefix)+1) == ($prefix . '/')));
00227 }
00228 
00229 
00230 /**
00231  * Return TRUE if the given path or its unaliased path begins with the specified prefix.
00232  */
00233 function slpjq_path_begins_with($prefix, $path = NULL) {
00234   if ($path === NULL) {
00235     $path = request_uri();
00236   }
00237   return
00238     _slpjq_path_begins_with($prefix, $path) ||
00239     _slpjq_path_begins_with($prefix, drupal_get_normal_path($path));
00240 }
00241 
00242 
00243 /**
00244  * Return a full path, given a path relative to our module directory.
00245  */
00246 function slpjq_get_path($relpath) {
00247   static $slpjq_path;
00248   if (!isset($slpjq_path)) {
00249     $slpjq_path = drupal_get_path('module', 'slpjq');
00250   }
00251   return $slpjq_path . '/' . $relpath;
00252 }
00253 
00254 
00255 /**
00256  * Determine whether or not the current page gets a SlipJaq slider
00257  *
00258  *  If the slider is displayed as a block, this restriction is <em>in addition to</em>
00259  *  any block restrictions
00260  */
00261 function slpjq_slider_allowed_here() {
00262   static $slpjq_slider_allowed_here;
00263   if (isset($slpjq_slider_allowed_here)) {
00264     return $slpjq_slider_allowed_here;
00265   }
00266   $slpjq_slider_allowed_here = FALSE;
00267   if (user_is_logged_in()) {
00268     // While logged in, we don't display on admin paths.(This is not configurable.)
00269     if (slpjq_path_begins_with('/admin')) {
00270       return FALSE;
00271     }
00272   }
00273   else {
00274     // While logged out, we don't display on these "disallowed" paths.
00275     foreach (explode("\n", variable_get('slpjq_disallowed_paths', array())) as $path) {
00276       if (slpjq_path_begins_with('/'. rtrim($path))) {
00277         return FALSE;
00278       }
00279     }
00280   }
00281   $slpjq_slider_allowed_here = TRUE;
00282   return TRUE;
00283 }
00284 
00285 
00286 /**
00287  * Render the HTML for the slider
00288  */
00289 function slpjq_slider_render() {
00290   static $already_rendered;
00291   if (!isset($already_rendered)) {
00292     $already_rendered = TRUE;
00293     return theme('slpjq_slider');
00294   }
00295   return '';    // We don't render this more than once per page.
00296 }
00297 
00298 
00299 /**
00300  * Redirect the form, overriding whatever redirect was already there
00301  */
00302 function slpjq_redirect_form_if_errors($form, $redirect = NULL) {
00303   if (form_get_errors()) {
00304     unset($_REQUEST['destination']);
00305     drupal_redirect_form($form, $redirect);
00306   }
00307 }
00308

00310 /**
00311  * Return the configuration form for admin/settings and block configuration.
00312  *
00313  * We also use this function during installation to set the initial values
00314  * of our configuration variables.
00315  */
00316 function slpjq_get_config_form() {
00317   static $config_form;
00318   if (!isset($config_form)) {
00319     $config_form = array( //! <strong>Drupal variables</strong> - We define these Drupal
00320                           //! variables for our configuration. See the in-line definitions
00321                           //! for details.
00322       'slpjq_display_top' => array( //! - slpjq_display_top
00323       // - slpjq_display_top
00324         '#type' => 'checkbox',
00325         '#title' => t('Display at page top'),
00326         '#description' => t('Display above all regions of the page at the full width of the browser window. (Never displays on admin pages.)'),
00327         '#default_value' => variable_get('slpjq_display_top', TRUE),
00328         ),
00329       'slpjq_title' => array( //! - slpjq_title
00330         '#type' => 'textfield',
00331         '#title' => t('Slider title'),
00332         '#size' => 40,
00333         '#maxlength' => 128,
00334         '#description' => t('The title that appears on the left side of the slider.'),
00335         '#default_value' => variable_get('slpjq_title', variable_get('site_name', '')),
00336         ),
00337       'slpjq_image_url' => array( //! - slpjq_image_url
00338         '#type' => 'textfield',
00339         '#title' => t('Slider image URL'),
00340         '#size' => 60,
00341         '#maxlength' => 128,
00342         '#description' => t('The URL of an image to display below the slider title. Leave blank for none. Normally begins with a slash (<strong>/</strong>) or <strong>http://</strong>.'),
00343         '#default_value' => variable_get('slpjq_image_url', ''),
00344         ),
00345       'slpjq_slide_period' => array( //! - slpjq_slide_period
00346         '#type' => 'textfield',
00347         '#title' => t('Slide period'),
00348         '#size' => 4,
00349         '#maxlength' => 4,
00350         '#description' => t('The time period, in milliseconds, that it takes for the slider to slide up or down.'),
00351         '#default_value' => variable_get('slpjq_slide_period', 300),
00352         ),
00353       'slpjq_create_button_text' => array( //! - slpjq_create_button_text
00354         '#type' => 'textfield',
00355         '#title' => t('Text on &ldquo;Create new account&rdquo; button'),
00356         '#size' => 40,
00357         '#maxlength' => 128,
00358         '#description' => t('The text on the submit button for the form that creates a new account.'),
00359         '#default_value' => variable_get('slpjq_create_button_text', t('Create new account')),
00360         ),
00361       'slpjq_disallowed_paths' => array( //! - slpjq_disallowed_paths
00362         '#type' => 'textarea',
00363         '#title' => t('Paths where not to display to anonymous users'),
00364         '#size' => 40,
00365         '#maxlength' => 128,
00366         '#description' => t('Enter one page per line as Drupal paths. When the slider is in a block, this restriction is <em>in addition to</em> any block restrictions. Wildcards are not recognized here.'),
00367         '#default_value' =>
00368           variable_get('slpjq_disallowed_paths',
00369             implode("\n", array(
00370               'login',
00371               'user',
00372               'user/password',
00373               'user/register',
00374               ))
00375             ),
00376         ),
00377       );
00378   }
00379   return $config_form;
00380 }
